dublin_core.dcvalue: The American Telemedicine Association ATA Standards and Guidelines Committee develops practice standards and guidelines Key to the Committee s mission is dissemination so the standards can be used in the practice of telemedicine Over a 2 year period when a standards document was accessed from the ATA Web site a short survey was completed but it did not assess how the documents were used once downloaded A more formal survey was conducted to determine the impact ATA standards and guidelines are having on healthcare delivery via telemedicine
Telemedicine journal and e-health : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
Utilization of the American Telemedicine Association's clinical practice guidelines.
